meta.name: Malik
meta.description: Just a developer who loves to code

hero.headline: Hi, I'm Malik. I love to code random stuff
hero.intro: Hey, I'm a 22-year-old full-stack dev and AI engineer who's all about building cool, fast, and awesome digital stuff. I geek out on solving tricky problems with AI magic and turning ideas into epic solutions!

entries.title: Master of Science in Computer Science
entries.summary: Focused on software engineering, algorithms, and data structures. Graduated with honors and completed a thesis on distributed systems and microservices architecture.

entries.title: Bachelor of Science in Information Systems
entries.summary: Advanced studies in cloud computing, machine learning, and modern web architectures. Research focused on scalable application design and performance optimization.

entries.description: Developed and maintained multiple client-facing applications. Implemented CI/CD pipelines and reduced deployment time by 60%. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products.
Built responsive and accessible web interfaces using modern frameworks. Improved page load times by 40% through optimization techniques. Worked closely with designers to implement pixel-perfect UIs.
Contributed to the development of a SaaS platform. Gained experience in agile methodologies and version control. Participated in code reviews and team knowledge sharing sessions.

skills.title: Skills & Technologies
skills.description: Technologies and tools I work with regularly

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Some of my recent work and side projects

entries.name: E-Commerce Platform
entries.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with payment integration, inventory management, and admin dashboard. Built for scalability with microservices architecture.

entries.name: Real-Time Chat Application
entries.description: WebSocket-based chat application with rooms, private messaging, file sharing, and online presence indicators. Supports 10,000+ concurrent users.

entries.name: AI-Powered Content Generator
entries.description: SaaS platform that uses AI to generate marketing content, blog posts, and social media captions. Integrated with OpenAI API and includes payment processing.

entries.name: Project Management Tool
entries.description: Collaborative project management application with kanban boards, Gantt charts, time tracking, and team collaboration features. Mobile-responsive design.

entries.name: Fitness Tracking App
entries.description: Mobile-first web application for tracking workouts, nutrition, and progress. Includes data visualization, goal setting, and social features.

entries.name: Portfolio Template Builder
entries.description: A no-code platform for creating beautiful portfolio websites. Users can choose templates, customize colors, and deploy with one click.
